hooks.command: grep -q 'node run deploy' && grep -q 'exit_code":0' && echo && echo "🚀 API Portal deployment started. Check CloudFormation stack progress." || exit 0
grep -q 'node run start' && grep -q 'exit_code":0' && echo && echo "🌐 Development server running at http://localhost:3000" || exit 0
grep -E 'cp.*custom-content' && grep -q 'exit_code":0' && echo && echo "📄 Remember: Copy custom content to all THREE locations!" || exit 0
echo '⚠️ Build system is fragile. Manually update files in THREE locations instead.' >&2 && exit 2
